category-def.name: roqme
category-def.label: RoQME
category-def.description: RoQME provides software engineers with methods and tools to deal with system-level non-functional properties, enabling the specification of global Quality-of-Service (QoS) metrics in robotics.

category-def.name: miron
category-def.label: MIRoN
category-def.description: Built on RoQME, MIRoN enables engineers to develop robots with the ability of self-adapting its course of action in order to improve non-functional properties at runtime.
